# AbstractUIC

> Reusable UI packages for AbstractFramework clients (React components + a small Web Component).

AbstractUIC is a multi-package repository. Most React packages export TypeScript/TSX source via `exports -> ./src/index.ts` and therefore require a bundler that transpiles dependencies. Styling is shipped as plain CSS imported by the components; for consistent tokens across packages, import `@abstractuic/ui-kit/src/theme.css` once in your app.

Key packages:
- `@abstractuic/ui-kit`: theme tokens + small UI primitives (selects/icons)
- `@abstractuic/panel-chat`: chat thread/message UI + markdown/json renderers
- `@abstractuic/monitor-flow`: agent-cycle trace viewer + ledger adapter
- `@abstractuic/monitor-active-memory`: KG + Active Memory explorer (ReactFlow)
- `@abstractutils/monitor-gpu`: GPU histogram widget (`<monitor-gpu>`) polling a metrics endpoint

## Documentation

- [Repository README](README.md): Overview, packages, and quick links
- [Getting started](docs/getting-started.md): Pick packages, install/integrate, required CSS, quick examples
- [Architecture](docs/architecture.md): Package boundaries + diagrams
- [Development](docs/development.md): Local workflow and tests
- [Publishing](docs/publishing.md): Maintainer release checklist
- [Docs index](docs/README.md): Full docs list

## Packages

- [@abstractuic/ui-kit](ui-kit/README.md): Theme tokens and UI primitives
- [@abstractuic/panel-chat](panel-chat/README.md): Chat primitives
- [@abstractuic/monitor-flow](monitor-flow/README.md): Agent cycle trace viewer
- [@abstractuic/monitor-active-memory](monitor-active-memory/README.md): KG/Active Memory explorer
- [@abstractutils/monitor-gpu](monitor-gpu/README.md): GPU widget
